As an independent nation, Ukraine’s rights to maintain its national sovereignty, defend its territorial integrity, and manage its associations within the global order are absolute. 

Now is the time for the Free World to rise up in defense of liberty.

My full statement ⤵️ https://t.co/57xLV6uzJM

1496144511894007817.text: By strengthening Ukraine’s position, demonstrating a unified global coalition, and forcing Putin to grasp the devastating consequences Russia will suffer – the world may avert the full breakout of war the likes of which it has not seen in nearly a century.

1496144510694432782.text: Now is the time for the Free World to rise up in defense of liberty.

1496144509545103375.text: The Free World has a responsibility to uphold the tenants of the Budapest Memorandum and Minsk Agreement, and to deter further Russian invasion of Ukraine through harsh and decisive political, economic, and defensive measures.

1496144508320370695.text: Ukraine’s security and its ability to exercise self-determination cannot be bargained away by Russian fiat – they must be guaranteed.

1496144507158646784.text: Putin, however, is testing the West’s commitments to the international rule of law and the mutual defense compacts that have preserved peace on the European continent throughout the post-World War II era.

1496144505866797064.text: As an independent nation, Ukraine’s rights to maintain its national sovereignty, defend its territorial integrity, and manage its associations within the global order are absolute.

1496144504667185155.text: Ukraine is not a threat to Russia, but Ukraine’s independence and democracy jeopardizes Putin’s stranglehold on power, and imperils his standing among the Russian people. Driven by his quest for self-preservation, Putin has fraudulently built the case for war.

1496144503366991879.text: This region of the world should be free and prosperous, not denied hope and opportunity by a corrupt and merciless tyrant.

1496144502200967170.text: Putin is a murderous dictator whose objective is rigid control of society. He accomplishes his barbaric schemes by suppressing human rights, eliminating independent media, assassinating political opponents, and limiting economic opportunity.

1496144500971954190.text: Now, at Vladimir Putin’s direction, Russia has illegally declared that sovereign Ukrainian territory is independent, and ordered troops to the region. This hostility is reminiscent of the tragic carnage unleashed by Putin over the years in Georgia, Moldova, and Armenia.

1496144499617185800.text: Through its rapid escalation of conflict, breach of cease-fire agreements, and hostile and irresponsible rhetoric, Russia has flagrantly rejected the norms of legal and civil behavior to which respectable nation states have long adhered.

1479118113912152077.text: While the events of that day were appalling, they have only deepened my resolve to help heal the nation, bridge the divide, and safeguard our democracy. For on the success of this endeavor, I believe the fate of present and future generations certainly depends.

1479118112318377985.text: Political violence, on the other hand, is not a legitimate mechanism to enact change. It is an act of cowardice, and a stain against our republic.

1479118110581932033.text: In America, we have the awesome ability to debate, disagree, compromise, and legislate for the common good – and we can do so through the ballot box.

1479118108795101190.text: Some officers ultimately lost their lives, while many more left with wounds that they still bear to this day. All courageously upheld their oaths in service to this nation, and in service to democracy.

1479118107230699525.text: On January 6th, 2021, I watched as U.S. Capitol Police officers defended the Capitol complex, along with the lives of thousands of people.

1479118105494228999.text: One year ago today, the hallowed grounds of the United States Capitol, and the very system of governance that has sustained our country for more than two centuries, came under attack.

1478049568990318595.text:
As always, if there is ever anything with which our office can be helpful in the year ahead, we are ready and able to assist however we can.

Onward!

1478049567853756422.text: I will continue the fight to help create good-paying jobs, rebuild our infrastructure, lower the cost of healthcare, and support our children, families, and seniors.

1478049566738071559.text: In 2022, I will continue to work with my colleagues on both sides of the aisle to ensure that our communities not only recover, but are strengthened for the days ahead.

1478049565605601283.text: Thank you to the healthcare heroes, first responders, grocery and food workers, small business owners, teachers, and so many more hardworking men and women who keep us moving.

1478049564569620496.text:
Last year was one of enormous change, particularly with the pandemic touching nearly every facet of our daily lives.

Through it all, I feel a deep sense of gratitude for those who continued to provide essential services that we all rely upon.

1478049563558780933.text: As we begin this New Year, we reflect on where we have been, and look ahead at the possibilities that await us.

1207480116575637505.text: In defense of our democracy, I have voted to impeach President Donald Trump. Onward Liberty.

1207480115703242752.text: No one is above the law, not even the president. Donald Trump is a threat to our republic and should be removed from office without delay.

1207480114826678276.text: It has taken the strong moral courage of whistleblowers, public servants, veterans, and legislators to bring us to this solemn moment in our nation’s history, but first and foremost it was the president’s own actions that started us down this unfortunate path.

1207480113966845952.text: I would like my constituents to know that a vote for impeachment is not one that has been whipped up by Democratic leadership – from its start, it has been driven by the public. Our office has fielded hundreds of calls from citizens urging impeachment.

1207480112993775616.text: President Trump is guilty of abusing his power and strengthening America’s adversaries. He has repeatedly obstructed Congress in his failure to comply with lawful subpoenas. His actions have subverted U.S. national interests and emboldened Putin.

1207480112083611649.text: President Trump has failed to defend our Constitution. Rather than stand up to Putin, Trump has aided him – hastening Russian interference in our 2016 election and withholding military aid from Ukraine to extort their interference in our 2020 election for his own personal gain.

1207480111135678464.text: At Putin’s direction, Russia illegally invaded our ally Ukraine in 2014. As Ukrainians defend Europe’s eastern flank, 14,000 have already died at Putin’s hand with over 2 million more displaced.

1207480110103830530.text: Putin has sought to sow disarray and destabilize our democracy and the NATO Alliance. He has coordinated murders, election hacking, propaganda, and the entrapment of willing fools who would put their own self-interests over liberty – President Trump among them.

1207480109235658753.text: But like so many patriotic Americans in Northern Ohio and communities across the country, I am deeply concerned by President Trump’s systematic betrayal of our values and national security in favor of our adversary Vladimir Putin.

1207480108287741955.text: No person runs for Congress with the desire to impeach a President – I certainly did not. For the sake of our democracy, we pray impeachment is never necessary.

1207480107419484161.text: Members of Congress swear a solemn oath to protect and defend our Constitution against all enemies foreign and domestic. Today, we fulfilled our Oath.
